div.h3: National School Lunch and School Breakfast Programs

span.div: We are pleased to inform you that all enrolled students at Morongo Unified School District are eligible to receive breakfast and lunch at no charge.

div.a: Letter regarding extension of closure 040920 (.rtf will open in a separate program)

div.br: Effective March 23, 2020, the Morongo Unified School District will close School and District offices to the public. This is in response to efforts to protect the health and safety of the public and employees from further spread of the Coronavirus. Essential district employees continue to staff the offices, and school business will be conducted utilizing the district phone system by calling (760) 367-9191, and following the phone prompts for the extension you wish to reach. Additionally, various offices can be reached by email. Curbside pickup of meals and work packets will continue.
